select count(event_id) from event where event_id > 0

select page, eventId, title, userId, hit, writer, regdate, recruit from( SELECT rownum page,eventId,title,userId, hit, writer, to_char(regdate, 'yy-mm-dd hh:mi:ss') regdate,recruit FROM (SELECT e.event_id eventId,e.title title ,e.user_id userId,e.hit hit ,u.name writer, e.regdate,e.recruit FROM event e, users u where e.event_id >0 and e.user_id=u.user_id
order by e.regdate desc) ) WHERE page BETWEEN #{pageStart} AND #{pageStart} + #{perPageNum} - 1 order by page asc
